detectors.description:
AaplPool1.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaplPool1.sol#846-861) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(duration) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaplPool1.sol#851)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaplPool1.sol#854)
